overview: Three continents, three languages, three women. Three women who live in Marseille and who have in common the same sea, the same horizon. Every morning, they wake up, immerse themselves in the city, work, struggle, love, try to find their places in the daily life of France. A daily life, like a tightrope between the past and the present, between here and there, woven and shaped every day by the thoughts and letters addressed to the distant family.
title: Sud, Est, Ouest
